code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,compose,createStore}from"redux";import profileReducer from"./profileReducer";import dialogsReducer from"./dialogsReducer";import usersReducer from"./usersReducer";import authReducer from"./authReducer";import thunkMiddleware from"redux-thunk";import{reducer as formReducer}from"redux-form";import appReducer from"./appReducer";import headerReducer from"./headerReducer";import todoListReducer from"./todoListReducer";var reducers=combineReducers({profilePage:profileReducer,dialogsPage:dialogsReducer,usersPage:usersReducer,header:headerReducer,auth:authReducer,form:formReducer,app:appReducer,todoList:todoListReducer});var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducers,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware)));window.__store__=store;export default store;
